str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From ana and krino; properly, to scrutinize, i.e. investigate, interrogate, determine.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Good action, well-doing, benefiting, kind service. From euergetes; beneficence.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
(lit: not strong), (a) weak (physically, or morally), (b) infirm, sick. Strengthless.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
